TopRowKPIs_1.label: TopRowKPIs

richTextContent.insert: Carbon credits helped bring down net emissions by 90%
All the emissions and Credit values are in tCO2e
Cost and Offset by Project Type
Number of carbon credits increased by 30% in last 2 years
Reforestation project in India was most used to offset emissions, which constitutes 405 of total carbon credits
Scope 1 and 2 emissions were fully offset in 2023
The cost of carbon credits used increased by 15% from last year
